mapper.insert: insert into event_item (EVT_ITEM_ID, EVENT_ID, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_ITEM_NAME, EVT_ITEM_CODE, VALUE_DATA_TYPE, EVT_ITEM_FORMAT, IS_NULLABLE, EVT_ITEM_LENGTH, STANDARD_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{evtItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtItemFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNullable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtItemLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{standardSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update event_item set EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_TYPE_ID = #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_ITEM_NAME = #{evtItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_ITEM_CODE = #{evtItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE_DATA_TYPE = #{valueDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_ITEM_FORMAT = #{evtItemFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NULLABLE = #{isNullable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_ITEM_LENGTH = #{evtItemLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STANDARD_SORT = #{standardSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_ITEM_ID = #{evtItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_ITEM_ID, EVENT_ID, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_ITEM_NAME, EVT_ITEM_CODE, VALUE_DATA_TYPE, EVT_ITEM_FORMAT, IS_NULLABLE, EVT_ITEM_LENGTH, STANDARD_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_item where EVT_ITEM_ID = #{evtItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select EVT_ITEM_ID, EVENT_ID, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_ITEM_NAME, EVT_ITEM_CODE, VALUE_DATA_TYPE, EVT_ITEM_FORMAT, IS_NULLABLE, EVT_ITEM_LENGTH, STANDARD_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_item
